Dear Sirs/Madams
Our clients are looking for A1 charterer for their Blt 2013 Japanese 28k BC for 1-3 years charter period.
Please let us know if you have potential charterer for this vessel.
Full info upon firm interest
MV TBA
Bulk Carrier

DWT 28,000 dwt

DRAFT:9.82 M LOA: 169.00 M BEAM: 27.20 M
Grain Capacity of 37,320 cu.m.
5HOLD / 5HATCH T 4 Crane(s) with a safe working load of 30.5 tonnes
MAIN ENGINE 1 x Diesel - MAN B. & W. 6S42MC6.1 - 2-stroke 6-cyl.
(All details are given good faith but without guarantee)
--------------------------
Please to have yr proposal
Thanks & Brgds
Capt Dhani
